product_name: Mission Playground Pave T-Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Dirt trails trump paved roads every time. Show your support for natural terrain with the organic cotton Mission Playground Pave T-shirt. It's a statement-making shirt you'll wear with pride. Organic cotton is naturally soft, breathable and made without the use of pesticides. Closeout.
